notes.text:
This update for ghostscript fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2016-8602: Insufficient parameter check in .sethalftone5 (bsc#1004237).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The .sethalftone5 function in psi/zht2.c in Ghostscript before 9.21 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted Postscript document that calls .sethalftone5 with an empty operand stack.
notes.title: CVE description
